channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Researchers find Antarctic penguin breeding is heating up sooner
item.description: Warming temperatures are forcing Antarctic penguins to breed earlier and that's a big problem for two of the cute tuxedoed species that face extinctio...

item.title: As Trump dismantles the existing world order, his version is still taking shape
item.description: In his second term, the president is embracing a foreign policy that breaks sharply from U.S. tradition. Both supporters and critics say he's upending...

item.title: Trump leaks world leaders' messages. And, Indiana wins its first national title
item.description: President Trump explains why he wants to acquire Greenland in private messages with world leaders. And, Indiana caps off a perfect football season wit...

item.title: Trump's Board of Peace has several invited leaders trying to figure out how it'll work
item.description: It's unclear how many leaders have been asked to join the board, and the large number of invitations being sent out, including to countries that don't...

item.title: The divorce between the U.S. and WHO is final this week. Or is it?
item.description: The U.S. is the only country allowed to withdraw from the World Health Organization. And Jan. 22 is the day when Trump's pullout announcement should g...

item.title: Stock markets react negatively to Trump's tariffs threats over Greenland
item.description: Stock markets opened in the red for the first time since President Trump threatened tariffs against European nations who oppose his plans to take over...

item.title: BBC visits UN compound Israel is demolishing in East Jerusalem
item.description: John Sudworth says the sounds of heavy machinery can be heard echoing around the neighbourhood.

item.title: China demands Taliban protect its citizens after deadly Kabul blast
item.description: The Islamic State group says they were behind the blast in Kabul, but police say they are still investigating the cause.

item.title: Spain train crash recovery continues as investigators probe 'gap' in rail
item.description: Authorities say the twisted train wreckage makes it difficult to recover people trapped inside.

item.title: What to expect from Davos amid Trump's Greenland standoff with European allies
item.description: President Trump is set to head to Davos, Switzerland, on Tuesday for the World Economic Forum as tensions continue to heighten with European allies. C...

item.title: Rep. Julia Letlow jumps into Louisiana Senate race with Trump's backing
item.description: GOP Rep. Julia Letlow is jumping into the Louisiana Senate race after President Trump encouraged her to challenge Sen. Bill Cassidy in the state's pri...

item.title: Trump posts texts from European leaders on Greenland threats
item.description: President Trump is making public the reactions from European leaders to his Greenland takeover bid. CBS News' Natalie Brand and Ramy Inocencio report.

item.title: US citizen says ICE removed him from his Minnesota home in his underwear after warrantless search
European Union leader calls Trump's tariff threat over Greenland a mistake
item.description: As the EU calls Trump's threat to tariff allies for rejecting his bid for Greenland a mistake, Denmark's leader laments "being threatened by our close...

item.title: Twelve schoolchildren killed after bus collides with lorry in South Africa
item.description: The fatal collision is just the latest in South Africa, where the road safety record is poor.

item.title: Anthony Joshua's driver appears in court after crash that killed two
item.description: The former heavyweight champion was a passenger in the crash, which killed two of his team members.

item.title: Surrounded by billionaires in Davos, Trump plans to lay out how he’ll make housing more affordable
Christian leaders urge protecting worshippers’ rights after protesters interrupt service
item.description: Several faith leaders are urgently calling for protecting the rights of worshippers while also expressing compassion for migrants.
